乍.definition: at first; suddenly; abruptly; to spread; (of hair) to stand on end; bristling

乍暖還寒.definition: (idiom) (of early spring weather) alternating between warm and cold

乍浦.definition: Zhapu town and port on north of Hangzhou Bay 杭州灣|杭州湾 in Zhejiang

乍浦鎮.definition: Zhapu town and port on north of Hangzhou Bay 杭州灣|杭州湾 in Zhejiang

乍青乍白.definition: (of sb's face) turning alternately green and white
